    8 FEB 2017 • beauty

    My microblading experience!

    Microblading was something I wanted for a long time. I researched the process heavily, but there were still surprises in the outcome. Overall I think I’m extremely happy with it. When I look at the before photo, there is no question. I felt so naked without brows, and honestly I’m not a makeup person. I hated that I felt ugly leaving the house without doing my brows. I don’t feel that way anymore, so I think microblading is worth it. All the photos to follow show no brow makeup.

    This is a before and after at the time of my first microblading session.
